title: Quarkus 1.11 released - RESTEasy Reactive, Dev UI, and more!
content: For each Quarkus release, it’s the same story: it comes with a ton of exciting new features and enhancements… But believe it or not, it’s true. 1.11 is an important milestone as it marks the beginning of two amazing new features: RESTEasy Reactive, Our Dev UI. But it also comes...
